source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_SEQ_00<tab>Nanamo appears to be reassessing her plans.
target: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_SEQ_00<tab>ゴールドソーサーのナナモ・ウル・ナモは、考え直しているようだ。
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_TODO_00<tab>クガネのハンコックと話す
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_TODO_01<tab>ウルダハのナナモ・ウル・ナモと話す

source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Nanamo at the Waking Sands.
target: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_TODO_02<tab>砂の家のナナモ・ウル・ナモと話す
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_TODO_03<tab>ナナモ・ウル・ナモと再度話す

source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_001<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Profit<var 1A 01 /var>... The thought never even crossed my mind.
target:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_001ウルダハの利益か……
わらわも、まだまだ考えが浅かったということじゃな。

source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_002<tab>But standing about lamenting my naivety will not do anyone any good. I shall consider my lesson learned, and press on.
target:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_002しかし、己の浅はかさを嘆いてはおれぬ。
学びを得て、前進あるのみじゃ！

source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_003<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─are you perchance acquainted with any successful merchants? If my attempt at philanthropy is obliged to reap a profit, it would seem wise to consult someone with a knack for business.
target:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_003ところで、)) (( )) 02 /var>よ、
そなたの知り合いに、熟練の商人はおらぬか？
利益の上げ方について尋ねるなら、商人を置いてほかになかろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_004<tab>Hm... Ordinarily, I would not trust any agent of the East Aldenard Trading Company─but if you hold this Hancock fellow in high esteem, I am content to be led by you. You may repay my faith by journeying to distant Kugane and speaking with him on my behalf.
target:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_004ふむ、クガネにて、東アルデナード商会の番頭に世話になったと。
ならば、その「ハンコック」とやらに、
協力を仰いできてはもらえぬだろうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_005<tab>Eager though I am to visit those shores, I have not the leisure for a lengthy sea voyage. Now, assuming you will travel as adventurers are wont to do, I shall await your report by the aetheryte in Ul'dah. A fair journey to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─and a <var 1A 02 /var>swift<var 1A 01 /var> one, if you please.
target:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_005さすがに、わらわは国外に出るわけにもゆかぬ。
手数をかけるが、後ほどウルダハのエーテライト・プラザ近くで、
合流するとしよう……それではな！

source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_HANCOCK_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! To what do I owe the pleasure? Or are you here on business?
target:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_HANCOCK_000_010オォ～、これは、これは、お久しぶりデ～ス。
今日は、どういったご用件で？

source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_HANCOCK_000_011<tab>...I beg your pardon? Her Grace the sultana would have <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> opinion on how best to invest the wealth of Ul'dah?
target:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_HANCOCK_000_011ナナモ様が、アラミゴ難民の帰国支援のため、
商人の助言を求めておられる……と。

source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_HANCOCK_000_012<tab>My dear <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... I have you to thank for this...recognition, I am sure. And I am flattered that you came to me. Truly flattered.
target:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_HANCOCK_000_012実に興味深い話デスが、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
来るところを間違えてマ～ス！

source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_HANCOCK_000_013<tab>But why settle for a lowly apprentice, when you could have the master! Upon matters of profit, there is no living soul better-qualified to advise Her Grace than Chairman Lolorito─a man whose morning “exertions” are said to fill his garderobe with gold!
target:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_HANCOCK_000_013アナタ方が相談すべきは、小物に過ぎない私などではなく、
東アルデナード商会の会長、ロロリトその人であるべきデ～ス！
「百億ギルの男」に勝る商人など、いませんからネ。

source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_HANCOCK_000_014<tab>I should be happy to arrange a meeting for you...say, at the Scions' former headquarters in Thanalan? The Waking Sands would seem a suitably <var 1A 02 /var>neutral<var 1A 01 /var> venue for negotiations, don't you think? Fare you well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and may your dealings prove fruitful!
target:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_HANCOCK_000_014私の方から、会長に取り次いでおきますから、
「暁」のザナラーンにおける拠点で、交渉するのデ～ス！
手強い相手デスが、ご武運をお祈りしていますヨ？

source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_HANCOCK_000_015<tab>You will not find a shrewder merchant than Chairman Lolorito. Would that I could be present to witness the back-and-forth of your coming negotiations!
target:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_HANCOCK_000_015本当に利益を得たいのなら、
「百億ギルの男」を、味方に付けるのデ～ス！
ン～、楽しくなってきましたネ！

source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_020<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Did your merchant friend have any useful advice to share?
target:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_020戻ったか、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
それで、ハンコックの協力は得られたのか？
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_021<tab>な、なんと……ロロリトとの交渉を提案されたと！？

source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_022<tab>I am well aware of his standing in the field of business. But I had hoped to keep the Monetarists at arm's length, and <var 1A 02 /var>him<var 1A 01 /var> in particular...
target:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_022……確かに利益を上げることにかけては、
ヤツに勝る者など、このウルダハにはおるまい……。
だが、ロロリトが共和派の筆頭であることは…………

source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_023<tab>...Nay. I cannot live in fear of the man. I must learn how to treat with him if I am to rule Ul'dah effectively.
target:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_023いや、これは砂の女王として、避けては通れぬ道か……。
ロロリトをも使いこなせずして、ウルダハを導くことなどできぬ！

source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_024<tab>Very well! I will meet with Lolorito. Let us go on ahead to the Waking Sands, and prepare for his coming.
target:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_024わらわは、覚悟を決めたぞ、)) (( )) 02 /var>！
すまぬが「砂の家」を、交渉の場とさせてもらいたい！
ウルダハとアラミゴの未来のため、ヤツを説き伏せてみせよう！

source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_030<tab>So this is where the Scions first congregated... I have heard many tales, but never had occasion to visit.
target:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_030ここが「暁の血盟」の拠点のひとつ、「砂の家」か……。
噂には聞いておったが、訪れるのははじめてのことじゃ。

source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_031<tab>To work, then. The hour of the meeting draws near, and I would gather my thoughts. Pray see to it that we have the appointed room to ourselves.
target:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_031さて、この一室を借りて、ロロリトとの交渉に臨むとしよう。
わらわは、少しばかり準備をするゆえ、すまぬが、
そなたは人払いの方を頼むぞ？

source: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_040<tab><sigh> I fear it will be many years before I feel comfortable taking part in such negotiations.
target:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_040……ふぅ。
このように緊張を強いられる交渉事は、なかなか経験がないぞ。

source:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_041But I shall not complain. We have piqued Lolorito's interest and secured his invaluable expertise.
Thank you, )) (( )) 02 /var>. I could not have done it without you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_041しかし、そなたが横にいてくれたおかげで、
どうにかロロリトから協力を取り付けることができた。
感謝するぞ、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
